title: Where it all started
description: Public Companies are DAOs and It's Time to APE.Weâ€™re crowdfunding the development of ClimateDAO: a platform for crowd-sourced investor activism. Backers will receive $CLIMATE, a utility token that acts as a passport to the ClimateDAO community, events, airdrops and more.
